title: Donnelly returns to Killie
title_page: Donnelly returns to Killie - BBC Sport
maintext:
Tried and tested, Liam Donnelly rejoins Killie after his contract expired at the end of last season.
The midfielder made 27 appearances in the Scottish Premiership for Derek McInnes side last season and he will spend another two years in Ayrshire.
The 27-year-old is Killie's eleventh signing of the summer and he will be available for the league opener against Rangers on Saturday.
